title: Familiar font...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021153247im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rim_4119.jpg)

I've seen that font before, but I can't remember where. Have you?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rim.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021153247/http:/typophile.com/files/rim.jpg) | 20.72 KB |
author: Meriba

comments.content:
Sorry, don't know this one and hard to find out what it could be with such bad quality sample (nothing personal of course :)  
/G loosely reminds me of [Eagle](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021153247/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/eagle) but the rest is truly off. So part of providing a better sample or more information, it could be quite impossible for me to dig more...

Thanks anyway Ryluk.

It looks more similar to [Dirty seven](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021153247/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-dirty-7/) to me, but with C/D/G more rounded and stretched. Your G is more similar, of course.

Maybe with that image is more easy to find it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021153247im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rim-campaign-font_6054.jpg)

Anyone recognize the font used for "RIM CAMPAIGN - DAY 342 - MALGUS"?

Thanks in advance ^\_^
